Title: The Hardest Word (2)
Plot: The case continues as we learn of the death of D.S. Dave Marvin. Marvin has been found dead in his car with the same markings of sorry on his back. Throughout this episode we learn that Greta is hiding something from us and who is the mysterious old man who keeps turning up every time a body is found???
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Contains violence and content that may disturb
